meaningMnemonic: If you're <kanji>anti</kanji> something and you <kanji>confront</kanji> the government about it, in some cases you are going <vocabulary>to rebel</vocabulary> against the government... that is, if you're crazy enough about it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
